items.sentence: Are you trying to get yourself thrown out of the club?
Even if it takes me the whole day, I'll do the typing.
If we unite our efforts, we'll be able to finish this.
Don't be afraid to raise your hand and ask a question.
It's not impossible to survive on just rice and beans.
It's been a while since I've told you that I love you.
Tom whispered something to Mary and she left the room.
Tom watched a movie while Mary was cleaning the house.
Tom wanted to apologize to Mary, but he was afraid to.
If someone had broken in, the alarm would've gone off.
Mary ran into one of her ex-boyfriends at Tom's party.
Did you really think I was the one slashed your tires?
Watch your step, or else you will trip on the baggage.
A sudden illness forced her to cancel her appointment.
They hate each other from the bottoms of their hearts.
Sometimes I say "yes," even though I want to say "no."
The crash was about three kilometers from the airport.
We're going to turn around and go back to the airport.
The only person who'd know that better than me is Tom.
If you can't say something nice, keep your mouth shut.
Tom and Mary clinked glasses and sipped the champagne.
One of the servants told Tom that Mary wasn't at home.
Tom made jam from the strawberries that Mary gave him.
Do you know what the weather forecast is for tomorrow?
Tom is the one that suggested that we try it this way.
Boston is the most interesting city I've ever visited.
I find it irritating when people talk during concerts.
When I was a kid, my parents often bought toys for me.
That's the most interesting story that I've ever read.
Tom made it very clear that he didn't want to do that.
Tom was about thirty feet away when the bomb went off.
Tom was the first person I met after moving to Boston.
The children are still asleep, so don't make a racket.
I've grown tired of watching this uninteresting match.
I'm going to study for the final exams this afternoon.
What countries formed the Axis Powers in World War II?
Tom's performance wasn't up to his fans' expectations.
The hotel I stayed in wasn't too far from Tom's house.
Tom says he isn't planning on staying here all winter.
Tom probably doesn't know he isn't likely to be fired.
Tom knows that he isn't supposed to help Mary do that.
Tom doesn't know he isn't supposed to do that anymore.
Maybe Tom doesn't know he isn't likely to be punished.

Put the book on the shelf when you're through with it.
I think our French teacher is around thirty years old.
Thank you for telling us that it was Tom who did that.
Tom wished that he could've spent more time with Mary.
I have a long list of stuff that I want to throw away.
Tom and Mary blamed each other for their baby's death.
